item.title: Dedicated piece to Sammy Yatim
item.description: Persian piece from Eghbal Lahuri scholar, Simorgh dedicates this piece to the soul of Sammy Yatim, the Syrian youth, who passed away this week in Toronto due to Canadian security and police violence, racism and anti-Eastern ideologies. May Sammy's soul rest in peace.
